title: Motivating Kids to Reflect the Character of God, Part 6
itunes:author: John Fuller & Danny Huerta
itunes:summary:
Out of Dr. Kathy Koch's 5 core needs of a child, John and Danny focus on identity and how to make kids feel like they know who they are and that they belong in your family.

Receive Kathy Koch's book Start With the Heart with your gift of any amount!
